SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_1_0: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_1_1: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayitum svabhāvam alaṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:1_0: yadi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ hetau pratyayeṣu ca hetupratyayasāmagrāñ ca pṛthak ca yatra sarvatra svabhāvo na vidyata iti kṛtvā śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:1_3: na pratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayasāmagrāṃ na hetupratyayavinirmuktaḥ pṛthag eva vā /
SA10nagvigvu:1_4: yasmād atra svabhāvo nāsti tasmān niḥsvabhāvo 'ṅkuraḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:1_6: yathā cāyam aṅkuro niḥsvabhāvo niḥsvabhāvāc ca śūnyaḥ tathā sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnya iti /
SA10nagvigvu:2_1: atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ / yady evaṃ tavāpi vacanaṃ yady etac chūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tad api śūnyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:2_2: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tad api hetau nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:2_3: mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:2_6: yasmād atra sarvatra nāsti / tasmān niḥsvabhāvaṃ / yasmān niḥsvabhāvaṃ / tasmāc chūnyaṃ / tasmād anena sarvabhāvasvabhāvavyavartanam aśakyaṃ kartuṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:2_7: kiṃ kāraṇaṃn / na hy asadagninā dagdhaṃ / nāpy asatā śāstreṇa śakyaṃ chettuṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:2_8: nāsatībhir atbhiḥ śakyaṃ kledayitum evam asattā vacanena śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kartuṃ na śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo nivartayituṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:2_9: tatra yad uktaṃ sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣidhaḥ sarvatra bhāvasvabhāvo vinivartata iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_2_0: atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hata pratijñā te /
SA10nagvigvu:4_0: athāpi manyase mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:4_1: sasvabhāvatvāc cāśūnyaṃ / tasmād anena sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo vinivarta iti /
SA10nagvigvu:5_0: atra brūmaḥ / yā hi te pratijñā śūnyāḥ svabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:5_1: hatā śā // kiñcānyat sarvabhāvāntargatañ ca tadvacanam /
SA10nagvigvu:5_2: kasmāt sarvabhāveṣu tvadvacanam aśūnyaṃ yenāśūnyatvāt sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:6_0: hanta cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvahhāvās tena tvadvacanaṃ śūnyam sarvabhāvāntargatatvāt tvadvacanasya /
SA10nagvigvu:6_2: tatra yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāva iti anupapannaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:6_3: 1 / upapannaś cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaśūnyatvād anena pratiṣedho anupapannaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:6_4: 2 / atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvās tvadvacanañ cāśūnyaḥ yena pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaṃ sarvatrāsaṃgṛhītaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:6_6: 3 / sarvatra cet punaḥ gṛhītaṃ tvadvacanaṃ sarvabhāvāś ca śūnyāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:6_7: tena tad api śūnyaṃ śūnyatvād anena nāsti pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:6_8: 4 / atha śūnyam asti vānena pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti tena śūnyāpi sarvabhāvāḥ kāryakriyāsamarthā samarthabhaveyuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:6_9_0: na caitad iṣṭaṃ / 5 / atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ na ca kāryaṃ kriyāsamarthaṃ bhavaṃti
SA10nagvigvu:6_9_1: mā bhūt dṛṣṭāntavirodha iti kṛtvā śūnyena tvadvacanena sarvabhāvāsvabhāvo pratiṣedho
SA10nagvigvu:7_3: yena hi viśeṣahetunā kiñcit śūnyaṃ kiñcid aśūnyaṃ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:7_4: sa ca nopadiṣṭo hetuḥ / tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_3_0: mā śabdavad ity etat syāt te buddhir na caitad upapannam /
SA10nagvigvu:9_0: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā nāma kaścit brūyāt mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr iti /
SA10nagvigvu:9_3: śūnyena vacanena sarvatā sarvabhāvasvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti /
SA10nagvigvu:10_0: atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ / etad apy anupapannaṃ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:10_1: satā hy atra śabdena hy atra bhaviṣyataḥ śabdasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:10_2: na punar iha bhavataḥ satā vacanena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:10_3: tava hi matena vacanam apy asat /
SA10nagvigvu:10_5: tasmād ayaṃ mā śabdavad iti viṣayopanyāso 'sann iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_4_0: pratipratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_4_1: evaṃ tava pratijña lakṣaṇato dūṣyate na mama //
SA10nagvigvu:12_0: syāt te buddhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py anenaiva kalpenānupapannaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:13_0: atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ / etad aśabdena sad eva / kasmāt tava ca hi pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptam etan na mama bhavān iha bravīti /
SA10nagvigvu:13_3: pūrvakaḥ pakṣo na mama / tatra yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evaṃ matam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_5_0: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
SA10nagvigvu:15_0: yadi pratyakṣataḥ sarvabhāvān upalabhya bhavān nivartayati śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:15_1: tad anupapannaṃ / kasmāt pratyakṣam api hi pramāṇaṃ svabhāvāntargatatvāt śūnyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:15_2: yo 'pi sarvabhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyas tasmāt pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena nopalambhabhāvo anupalabdhasya ca pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:16_1: syāt te buddhiḥ / anumānenāgamenopānena vā sarvabhāvān upalabhya sarvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti /
SA10nagvigvu:18_0: anumānam apy upamānāgamāś ca pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena pratyuktāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:18_1: yathā hi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:18_3: sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt / ye 'py anumānasādhyārthā āgamasādhyā upamānasādhyāś ca /
SA10nagvigvu:18_4: te 'pi śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt* anumānopamānāgamaiś ca yo 'pi bhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyaḥ tasmāt bbāvānām upalambhābhāvo 'nupalabdhānāñ ca svabhāvapratiṣedhānupapattiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:18_5: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_7_1: kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:20_0: iha dharmāvasthāvido manyante kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:20_2_0: saṃjñāyāś cetanāyāḥ / sparśasya manasikārasya chandasyādhimokṣasya vīryasya smṛteḥ
SA10nagvigvu:20_2_1: samādheḥ prajñāyā upekṣāyāḥ prayogasya saṃprayogasya prāpto 'dhyāśayasya prativirateḥ
SA10nagvigvu:20_3: unmūrdhe utsāhasya avyārtyasya vasitāyāḥ pratipatter avipratīsārasya dhṛter adhyavasāyasya /
SA10nagvigvu:20_6: aniryāṇikatāyā utsādasya / sthiter anityatāyāḥ samarthāgatasya jarāyāḥ paridrāsyatārateḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:20_8: vyavahāratāyāḥ / prekṣupratikūlasya pradakṣiṇagrāhasya vaiśāradyagauravasya citrīkārasya [Vv_234] bhakter abhakteḥ suśrūṣāyāḥ sādarasyānādarasya prasrabdheḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:20_9: hāsasya vācaḥ viṣpandanāyāḥ siddhasyāprasādasya aprasrabdheḥ vyavahāratāyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:20_11: upāyāsāyas vītasya / apradakṣiṇagrāhasya saṃepasya saṃvarāṇāṃ pariśuddher adhyāśayasya rūpasyeti /
SA10nagvigvu:20_14: amada alobha adoṣa amoha asarvat* apratiniḥsargaḥ vibhava apatrayā apariśucchadanaṃ mānanaṃ kāruṇyaṃ maitrī adīnatādaritamari.
SA10nagvigvu:20_17: puṇyaṃ / asaṃjñisamāpattiḥ / nairyāṇikatāsarvajñatāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ ity ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ kuśalānāṃ kuśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:21_3: kāmoktānāṃ kāmoktaḥ / rūpoktānāṃ rūpoktaḥ / ārūpyoktānām ārūpyoktaḥ / anāśravāṇām anāśravaḥ / duḥkhoktānāṃ duḥkhoktaḥ / samudayoktānāṃ samudayoktaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:21_4: nirodhoktānāṃ nirodhoktaḥ / mārgoktānāṃ mārgoktaḥ / bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:21_6: prahātavyānāṃ prahātavyaḥ / yasmād evam anekaprakāro dharmasvabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:21_7: tasmād iha yad uktaṃ / niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnya iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_8_0: nairyāṇikasvabhāvo dharmo nairyāṇikāś ca ye teṣāṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:23_0: iha ca dharmo 'vasthoktānāṃ nairyāṇikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇikaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:23_6: evaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ tad yasmād evam anekaprakāro dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_9_0: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ity evaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_9_1: nāmāpi bhavet naivaṃ nāmāpi nirvastukan nāsti //
SA10nagvigvu:25_0: yadi ca dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvāc cāśūnyaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:25_1: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_10_0: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_10_1: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktam upadeṣṭum //
SA10nagvigvu:27_0: atha manyase mā bhūd avastukaṃ nāmeti kṛtvāsti svabhāvaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:27_2: evaṃ dharmaśūnyatā ca niḥsvabhāvatvād dharmāṇāṃ siddhā bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:28_0: atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ / evaṃ kasyedānīṃ sa svabhāvo dharmavinirmuktasyārthasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭum arthaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:28_1: sa ca nopadiṣṭas tasmād yā kalpanāsti svabhāvo na punar dharmāṇām iti sā hīnā /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_11_0: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_11_1: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt //
SA10nagvigvu:30_0: iha ca sato 'rthasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate nāmataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:30_3: nāsataḥ / evam eva nasti svabhāvo dharmāṇām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:30_5: tatra yad uktaṃ / niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_12_0: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kin na pratiṣidhyate tvayānena /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_12_1: vacanena rte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:32_0: nāsty eva svabhāvā ity anena vacanena niḥsvabhāvā bhāvā iti kiṃ bhavatā pratiṣidhyate /
SA10nagvigvu:32_1: asato hi vacād vinā siddhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_13_1: evaṃ mithyāḥ grāhaḥ syāt te pratiṣidhyate hy asataḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:34_0: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā bālānāṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ mithyājalam iti grāho bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:34_1: nanu nirjalā sā mṛgatṛṣṇeti tatra paṇḍitajātīyena puruṣeṇocyate /
SA10nagvigvu:34_2: tasya mithyāgrāhasya vinivartanārtham evan niḥsvabhāveṣu yaḥ svabhāvo grāhaḥ satvānāṃ tasya vyāvartanārthan niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity ucyata iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_14_0: nanv evaṃ saty asti grāho grāhyañ ca tadgrahītā ca /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_14_1: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat //
SA10nagvigvu:37_0: yady evaṃ nanv evaṃ saty asti tāvat satvānāṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:37_2: asti pratiṣedhaḥ tasyāpi mithyāgrāhasyāsti pratiṣedhyaṃ yad idaṃ mithyāgrāhyaṃ nāma /
SA10nagvigvu:37_3: santi pratiṣedhāro yuṣmadādayo 'sya mithyāgrāhasyeti siddhaṃ ṣaṭkam /
SA10nagvigvu:37_4: ṣaṭkasyāsya prasiddhatvāt / yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_15_0: atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_15_1: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhāro 'py ata na santi //
SA10nagvigvu:38_0: atha mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti kṛtvā naiva grāho 'sti naiva grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāra iti /
SA10nagvigvu:38_1: evaṃ sati yo 'sau grāhasya pratiṣedhaḥ niḥsvahhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:38_2: so 'pi nāsti pratiṣedhyam api nāsti pratiṣedhāro 'pi na santi /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_16_0: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhārāaś ca yady uta na santi /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_16_1: siddhā hi sarvabhāvā yeṣām evaṃ svabhāvaś ca //
SA10nagvigvu:40_0: yadi ca na pratiṣedho na pratiṣedhyaṃ na pratiṣeddhāraḥ santy apratisiddhāḥ sarvabhāvā asti ca sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_17_0: hetoḥ svato na siddhiḥ naiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:42_0: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity etasmin arthe te hetor asiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:42_1: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād dhi sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvān na tato hetuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:42_2: asati hetau nirhetukasyārthasya śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti kuta eva prasiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:42_3: / tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_18_0: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:44_0: atha manyase nairhetukī siddhiḥ niḥsvabhāvatvasya bhāvānām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_19_0: atha hetor astitvaṃ bhāvānaiḥsvābhāvyam ity anupapannam /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_19_1: loko naiḥsvabhāvyān na hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:46_2: / kiṃ karaṇaṃ / na hi loke niḥsvabhāvaḥ kaścid bhāvo 'sti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_20_0: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam iti na copapannam /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_20_1: yaś cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvo 'san //
SA10nagvigvu:48_0: iha pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāc ca pratiṣedhyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:48_1: niḥsvabhāvyaṃ nopapannaṃ / asati hi pratiṣedhye kasya pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:48_2: / atha paścāt pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvaṃ pratiṣedhyam iti ca nopapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:48_3: siddhe hi pratiṣedhye kiṃ pratiṣedhaḥ karoti /
SA10nagvigvu:48_4: atha yugapatpratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhye tathāpi na pratiṣedhyaḥ pratiṣedhyasyārthasya kāraṇaṃ prati na pratiṣedhyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:48_5: na pratiṣedhasya ca / yathā yugapadutpannayor goviṣāṇayoḥ naiva dakṣiṇaṃ savyasya kāraṇaṃ savyaṃ vā dakṣiṇasya gāraṇaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:48_6: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:50_0: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
SA10nagvigvu:50_1: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayituṃ svabhāvam alam iti / [1]
SA10nagvigvu:52_0: yadi madvaco hetau nāsti mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:52_1: uraḥkaṇthojihvādantatālunāsikamūrdhaprabhṛtiṣu ya + + sāmagryām asti heṃpratyayasāmagrīṃ vinirmuktaṃ pṛthag vāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:52_3: evaṃ / nanu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād asya madīyavacasaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:52_6: yad bhavatoktaṃ tvadīyavacasaḥ śūnyatvāt śūnyatā sarvabhāvānāṃ nopapadyata iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_22_0: yaś ca pratītya bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti taṃ brū + + /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_22_1: yas tu pratītyabhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvaṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:54_0_0: śūnyatārthañ ca bhavān bhāvānām anavasamya śūnyatārtham ajñātvā pravṛtti upālambhaṃ
SA10nagvigvu:54_0_1: vaktuṃ tvadvacanasya śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya niḥsvabhāvatvād evaṃ tvadvacanena niḥsvabhāvena
SA10nagvigvu:54_1: iha hi yaḥ pratītya bhavānāṃ bhāvaḥ sā śūnyatā /
SA10nagvigvu:54_2: kasmān niḥsvabhāvatvāt / ye hi pratītyasamutpānnā bhāvās te sa sasvabhāvā bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:54_6: na cevaṃ bhavanti / tasmān niḥsvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnyā ity abhidhīyante /
SA10nagvigvu:54_7: evaṃ madīyam api vacanaṃ / pratītyasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyam ity upapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:55_2: rathapaṭaghaṭādayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu kāryeṣu kāṣṭhāhaṇamṛttikaharaṇamadhūdakapayasāṃ dhāraṇā śītavātātapaparitrāṇaprabhṛtiṣu vartante /
SA10nagvigvu:55_3: evam idaṃ madīyavacanaṃ pratyayasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaprasādhanaṃ pratyayabhāvānāṃ vartate /
SA10nagvigvu:55_4: tra yad uktaṃ / niḥsvabhavatvāt tvadīyavacanasya śūnyatvaṃ śūnyatvāt tasya ca tena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedha upapannam iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_23_1: pratiṣedhayati yadvat pratiṣedho yaṃ tathaiva syāt //
SA10nagvigvu:57_0: yathā nirmitakaḥ puruṣam abhyāpataṃ tu kaścid arthena vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet /
SA10nagvigvu:57_1: māyākāreṇa vā sṛṣṭo māyāpurnṣo 'nyaṃ māyāpuruṣa samabhyava tan na kasminścid arthe vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet /
SA10nagvigvu:57_2: tatra yo nirmitakaḥ puruṣaḥ pratiṣedhyate sa śūnyaḥ yaḥ pratiṣedhayati so 'pi māyāpuruṣaḥ śūnya evam eva madvacanena śūnyena sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedha upapannaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:57_3: / tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ / śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedho nopapannam iti na tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:57_4: ṣaṭkoṭiko vāda uktaḥ sa evaṃ pratisiddhaḥ naiva hy evaṃ sati na sarvabhāvāntargataṃ madvacanaṃ nāpy aśūnyaṃ nāpi sarvabhāvāśūnyāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:59_0: atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hatā pratijñā te
SA10nagvigvu:59_1: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavya ity [2]
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_24_0: na svābhāvikam etad vākyaṃ tasmān na vādahānir me /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_24_1: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśesahetuś ca na nigadyaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:61_0: na tāvad etan mama vacanaṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvopapannaṃ yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:61_2: yasmāc ca idam api madvacanaṃ śūnyaṃ śeṣāpi sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyās tasmān nāsti vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:61_3: yadi hi vayaṃ brūmaḥ / idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti tato vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:61_4: syān na caitad evaṃ tasmān na vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:61_5: yasmāc ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ punaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:61_6: tasmād asmābhir viśeṣahetur api na vaktavyaḥ anena idaṃ vacanaṃ aśūnyaṃ sarvabhāvāḥ punaḥ śūnyā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:61_7: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ vādahānis te vaiṣamikatvaṃ ca viśeṣahetuś ca tvayā vaktavya iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:63_0: mā śabdavad ity etad asmāt te buddhir na caitad upapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:63_1: śabdena hy atra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti / [3]
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_25_0: mā śabdavad iti nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yas tvayā mamārahdhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_25_1: śabdena hi tac ca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naidam eva caḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:65_0: nāpy ayam asmākaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ / yathā kaścin mā śabdaṃ karṣīr iti bruvaṃ śabdam eva karoti śabdañ ca pratiṣedhayati /
SA10nagvigvu:65_2: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / atra hi dṛṣṭānte śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:65_4: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt tad aśūnyām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_26_0: naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ cen naiḥsvābhāvyena vāraṇaṃ yadi hi /
SA10nagvigvu:67_0: yathā mā śabdam iti śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:67_1: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ vyāvartanaṃ kriyate tato 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntopapannaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:67_2: iha tu naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena bhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:67_3: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena niḥsvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvabhāvyapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:67_6: śūnyatāñ ca vayaṃ bhāvānām ācakṣmahe nāśūnyatām ity adṛṣṭānta evāyam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_27_0: atha vā nirmitakāyāṃ yathā striyāṃ striyam ity asatgrāham /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_27_1: nirmitakaḥ pratihanyāt kasyacid evaṃ bhaved ettata //
SA10nagvigvu:69_0: atha vā kasyacit puruṣasya nirmitakāyāṃ striyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyāyāṃ paramārthataḥ striyam ity asadgrāhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:69_1: syād eva tasyāṃ tenāsadgrāheṇa rāgam utpādayet /
SA10nagvigvu:69_2: tad yathā tathāgatena vā tacchrāvakeṇa vā nirmitako nirmitaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:69_3: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena vā tathāgatasrāvakādhiṣṭhānena vā tasya tam asadgrāhaṃ vinivartayet /
SA10nagvigvu:69_4: evam eva nirmitakopamena śūnyena vacanena nirmitakastrīsadṛśyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu yo 'yaṃ svabbāvagrāhaḥ sa nivartyate sa pratiṣidhyate /
SA10nagvigvu:69_5: tasmād ayam atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ śūnyatāprasādhanaṃ pratyupapadyamāno netaraḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_28_0: atha vā sādhyasamo yaṃ hetur na hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
SA10nagvigvu:71_0: mā śabdavad iti sādhyasama evāyaṃ hetuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:71_3: svabhavaṃ sattāḥ vidyate / tasyāḥ svabhāvasattāyāḥ avidyamānatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:73_0: śabdena hy atra sattā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti /
SA10nagvigvu:75_0: api ca na vayaṃ vyavahārasatyaṃ pratyākhyāya vyavahārasatyam anabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:75_1: śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti / na hi vyavahārasatyam anāgamya śakyā dharmadeśanā kartuṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:77_1: paramārtham anāgamya nirvāṇaṃ nādhigamyata iti / [= MMK 24.18]
SA10nagvigvu:78_0: tasmān madvacanavat śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvānāñ ca niḥsvabhāvatvam ubhayathopapadyamānam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:80_0: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
SA10nagvigvu:80_1: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato dūṣyeta na mameti / [4]
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_29_0: yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syān na me tat* eṣa me bhaved doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_29_1: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmān naivāsti me doṣaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:82_0: yadi ca kācin mama pratijñā syāt tato mama pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt sa pūrvako doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:82_1: yathā tvayoktaṃ bhāvāḥ tathā mama syān na ca mama kācid asti pratijñā /
SA10nagvigvu:82_2: tasmāt sarvahhāveṣu śūnyeṣv atyantopaśānteṣu prakṛtivivikteṣu kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptiḥ kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇatāprāptikṛto doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:82_3: tatra yat bhavatoktaṃ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt tavaiva doṣa iti tan nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:84_0: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya nivartayasi bhāvān
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_30_0: yadi kiñcid upalabheyaṃ pravarteyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā /
SA10nagvigvu:87_0: yady ahaṃ kiñcid artham upalabheyaṃ pratyakṣānumānopa + + + + hetubhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:87_1: caturṇāṃ vā pramāṇānāṃ / anyatamānyatamena / ata evaṃ pravartayeyaṃ vārtham evāhaṃ kiñcin nopalabhate tasmān na pravartayāmi na nivartayāmi /
SA10nagvigvu:87_3: yadi pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānām anyatamena upalabhya bhāvān vinivartayasīti /
SA10nagvigvu:87_4: nanu bhavatoktāni pramāṇāni na santi taiś ca pramāṇair api gamyārthā iti sa me bhavaty evānupālambha iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_31_0: yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhir arthānām /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_31_1: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:90_0: yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣām arthānāṃ prameyānāṃ siddhiṃ manyase yathā mānair meyānāṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:90_1: tathā teṣām idānīṃ pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamānāṃ caturṇāṃ pramāṇānāṃ kutaḥ prasiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:90_2: yadi tāvan niḥpramāṇānāṃ pramāṇaṃ syān nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya /
SA10nagvigvu:90_3: yadi punaḥ manyase pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ pramāṇato 'rthānāṃ prasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_32_0: anyaiḥ yadi pramāṇaiḥ pramāṇasidhir bhavaty anavasthā syān /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_32_1: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya //
SA10nagvigvu:92_0: yadi punar manyase / pramāṇaiḥ prameyāṇāṃ prasiddhis teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir anavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:93_0: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya /
SA10nagvigvu:94_1: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ teṣam api hi pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ siddhis teṣām anyair iti nāsty ādiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:94_2: āder asadbhāvāt kuto madhyaṃ kuto antaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:94_3: tasmāt teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ nopapadyateti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_33_0: teṣām atha pramāṇair vinā prasiddhiḥ vihīyate vādaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:96_0: atha manyase teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vinā pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ prameyānāṃ punar arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:96_1: evaṃ sati yas te vādaḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir arthānām iti hīyate vaiṣamikatvañ ca bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:96_2: keṣāñcit / arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:96_3: yena hetunā keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti /
SA10nagvigvu:96_4: sā ca nopadiṣṭaḥ tasmād iyam api kalpanā nopapanneti /
SA10nagvigvu:97_0: atrāha / pramāṇāny eva mama svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ca prasādhayanti / yathoktaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:98_0: dyotayati svātmānaṃ yathā hutāsaḥ tathā parātmānaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_34_0: viṣamopanyāso 'yaṃ na hy ātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_34_1: na hi tasyānupalabdhiḥ dṛṣṭā tamasīva kumbhasya //
SA10nagvigvu:101_0: viṣama evāyam upanyāsaḥ / agnivat pramāṇāni svātmānañ ca prasādhayanti parātmānañ ca prasādhayantīti /
SA10nagvigvu:101_2: yadi hi yathā prāg evāgninā aprakāśitas tamasi kumbho nopalabhyate /
SA10nagvigvu:101_3: athottarakālam upalabhyate 'gninā prakāśitaḥ san evam eva yady agninā na prakāśitaḥ prāg agniḥ syād uttarakālam agneḥ prakāśanaṃ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_35_0: yadi ca svātmānam ayaṃ tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_35_1: param iva na tv ātmānaṃ paridhakṣyaty api hutāśaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:104_0: yadi ca tvadvacanena yathā parātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ evam eva svātmānam api prakāśayaty agnir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:104_3: na caitad evaṃ / tatra yad uktaṃ parātmānam iva svātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_36_0: yadi ca svaparātmānau tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:106_0: yadi ca bhavato bhavato matena svātmāparātmānau prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:106_2: naitad iṣṭaṃ / tatra yad uktaṃ svaparātmānau prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_37_0: nāsti tamaś ca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhate parātmani jvalanaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_37_1: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo andhakāravadhaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:108_0: iha cāgnau nāsti tamaḥ / nāpi ca yatrāgnis tatrāsti tamaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:108_1: prakāśaś ca nāma tamasaḥ pratighātas tatra katham asya tamasaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:108_2: pratighātam agniḥ karoti / yasya pratighātat svaparātmānau prakāśayatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:109_0: āha / yad yasmād evaṃ nāgnau tamo 'sti /
SA10nagvigvu:109_2: yasmād evaṃ svaparātmānau na prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:109_3: tena hy utpadyamānenaivāgninā tamasaḥ pratighataḥ kutaḥ tasmān nāgnau tamo 'sti /
SA10nagvigvu:109_5: yasmād utpadyamāna evobhayaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_38_0: utpadyamāna eva prakāśayaty agnir ity asadvādaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_38_1: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:111_0: ayam agnir utpadyamāna eva prakāśayati svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti /
SA10nagvigvu:111_1: nāyam upapadyate vādaḥ / kasmān na hy utpadyamāna evāgniḥ tamaḥ prāpnoti /
SA10nagvigvu:111_2: aprāptatvān naivopahanti / tamasaś cānupaghātān nāsti prakāśaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_39_0: aprāpto 'pi jvalano yadi vā punar andhakāram upahanyāt /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_39_1: sarveṣu lokadhātuṣu tamo 'yam iha saṃsthita upahanyāt //
SA10nagvigvu:112_0: athāpi manyase aprāpto 'py agnir andhakāram upahantīti /
SA10nagvigvu:112_1: nanv idānīm iha saṃsthito agniḥ sarvalokadhātustham upahaniṣyati tamaḥ tulyāyām aprāpto na caitad evaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:112_2: tasmād aprāpyaivāgnir andhakāram upahantīti yad iṣṭaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_40_0: yadi ca svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir anapekṣya te prameyāṇi /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_40_1: bhavati pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāparāpekṣā hi siddhir iti //
SA10nagvigvu:114_0: yadi cāgnivat svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir iti manyase /
SA10nagvigvu:114_1: anapekṣāpi prameyāṇi pramāṇānāṃ siddhiḥ bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:115_0: atrāha / yadi nāpekṣyante prameyān arthān apramāṇāni ko doṣo bhaviṣyatīti / atrocyate /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_41_0: anāpeksā hi prameyān arthān yadi te pramāṇasaṃsiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_41_1: bhavati na bhavanti kasyacid evam imāni pramāṇāni //
SA10nagvigvu:116_0: yadi prameyān arthān anapekṣya siddhir bhavati pramāṇānām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:116_1: tānīmāni pramāṇāni na kasyacit pramāṇāni bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:116_2: evaṃ doṣaḥ // atha kasyacit bhavanti prāmāṇāni /
SA10nagvigvu:116_3: naivedānīm anapekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇāni bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_42_0: atha matam apekṣa siddhis teṣām iti atra bhavati ko doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_42_1: siddhasya na sādhanaṃ syān nāsiddho pekṣate hy anyat //
SA10nagvigvu:118_0: athāpi matam apekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇānāṃ siddhir bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:118_1: evaṃ te sati siddhasya pramāṇacatuṣṭayasya sādhanaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:118_2: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / na hy asiddhasyārthasyāpekṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:118_3: na hy asiddho devadattaḥ kañcid artham apekṣate na ca siddhasya sādhanam iṣṭaṃ kṛtasya kāraṇam anupapatter iti /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_43_0: sidhyanti hi prameyāṇy apekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvigvu:120_2: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na hi sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhayati /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_44_0: yadi ca prameyasiddhir anapekṣaiva bhavati pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_44_1: kin te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yad arthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tata //
SA10nagvigvu:122_0: yadi ca manyase 'napekṣyaiva pramāṇāni prameyānāṃ prasiddhir bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:122_1: kim idānīṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā paryanviṣṭayā kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /

SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_69_0: yat traikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaṃ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:182_0: sa eṣa hetuḥ traikālye pratiṣedhavācī sa tūktottaraḥ pratyavamantaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:182_1: kasmāt sādhyasamatvāt / yathā hi pratiṣedhas traikālye nopapady.
SA10nagvigvu:182_3: tasmāt pratiṣedhapratiṣedhye 'sati bhavān manyate pratiṣedhaḥ pratisiddha iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:182_4: yataś caiṣa trikālapratiṣedhavācī hetur eṣa eva śūnyatāvādināṃ prāptaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhakatvān na bhavataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:184_0: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiñcit
SA10nagvigvu:184_1: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eṣa tvayā kriyata [63] iti //
SA10nagvigvu:185_1: atha manyase triṣv api kāleṣu + + + + + + + dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvakālīno 'pi hetuḥ uttarakālīno 'pi /
SA10nagvigvu:185_2: yugapatkālīno 'pi hetuḥ / kathaṃ pūrvakalīnaḥ / yathā pitā putrasya tvadvacanena paścātkālīnaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:185_3: yathā śiṣyācāryasya yugapatkālīnaḥ yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasyeti /
SA10nagvigvu:185_4: / atra brūmaḥ / na caitad eva yuktā hy etasmiṃ traye pūrvadoṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:185_5: / api ca punaḥ yady evaṃ kamaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_70_0: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:nagvv_70_1: prabhavati na tasya kinna prabhavati śūnyatā yasyeti //
SA10nagvigvu:187_0: yasya śūnyateyaṃ prabhavati tasya sarvārthā laukikalokottarāḥ prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:187_1: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / yasya hi śūnyatā prabhavati tasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:187_2: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati tasya catvāry āryasatyāni prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:187_7: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavanti tasya dharmo dharmahetur dharmaphalañ ca prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:187_9: tasya kleśaḥ kleśasamudayaḥ kleśavastūni ca prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:187_10: yasyaitat sarvaṃ bhavati pūrvoktaṃ tasya sugatiṃ durgatiṃ vyavasthā + + + + + + + gatidurgatigamanaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:187_11: sugatidurgatigāmī mārgaḥ / sugatidurgatigamanavyatikramaṇaṃ sugatidurgativyatikramopāyaḥ sarvasaṃvyavahārāś ca lokikāḥ svayam adhigantavyāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:187_12: anayā diśā kiñcit śakyaṃ vacanopadeṣṭam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:189_1: anekārthāṃ nijagāda praṇamāmi tam apratimaṃ tu buddhim iti //
SA10nagvigvu:191_0: // likhitam idaṃ śrīdhramakirtinā sarvasatvahetoḥ yathālabdham iti //
